entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Are you tweeting this during the WH meeting of Covid19 doctors & leaders, those in charge of stopping this pandemic? You'll sicken them because your narcissistic ego can't fathom that you caught coronavirus from the three people you had contact with this week. #Hypocrisy
